meanings.definition: The quality or state of being florid.
meanings.sent1: The floridness of the garden's flowers brought joy to all.
meanings.sent2: Her cheeks had a natural floridness that made her look healthy.
meanings.sent3: The floridness of his speech about the simple task made everyone chuckle.
meanings.sent4: The floridness of the sunset painted the sky in vibrant hues.
meanings.sent5: The artist captured the floridness of the landscape with bold strokes.

meanings.definition: Excessive elaborateness or ornamentation in style, speech, or writing.
meanings.sent1: The floridness of the cake's decoration was overwhelming.
meanings.sent2: His writing was filled with unnecessary floridness that distracted from the main point.
meanings.sent3: The floridness of her outfit made her stand out in the crowd.
meanings.sent4: The floridness of the building's architecture was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent5: The floridness of the music overwhelmed the listeners with its complexity.
